name: @google-cloud/recaptcha
description: A reCAPTCHA Enterprise Typescript library for Edge Compute Platforms.
author: reCAPTCHA Team <no-reply@google.com>

scripts.devbuild: npm install && npm run genproto && npm run build && mkdir -p dist/generated && cp -r src/generated/ dist/generated/
scripts.devclean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf pkg && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf coverage && rm package-lock.json
scripts.genproto: mkdir -p src/generated && npx protoc --ts_out src/generated --proto_path src/proto src/proto/soz.proto src/proto/status.proto src/proto/recaptchaenterprise.proto
